item.name: Create Global Ladder Job Post (Moving Goods)

body.raw:
{
  "type": "GLOBAL",
  "category": "LADDER",
  "ladderType": "MOVING_GOODS",
  "luggageVolume": "5톤짐",
  "workFloor": 10,
  "overallHeight": 30,
  "loadingUnloadingService": "BOTH",
  "travelDistance": "WITHIN_JURISDICTION",
  "dumpService": false,
  "movingFee": 3000,
  "workDateType": "TODAY",
  "arrivalTime": "09:00",
  "isNightWork": false,
  "paymentMethod": "DIRECT_PAYMENT",
  "expectedPaymentDate": "Same Day",
  "withFee": true,
  "siteAddress": "123 Apartment Complex, Seoul, South Korea",
  "contactNumber": "010-1234-5678",
  "workContents": "Moving furniture to 10th floor apartment",
  "deliveryInfo": "Please coordinate with building management"
}

/*
LADDER JOB POST OPTIONS:

1. LADDER TYPE:
   - MOVING_GOODS: For moving furniture/appliances
   - ON_SITE: For construction/repair work

2. LUGGAGE VOLUME (톤짐):
   - 1톤짐, 2.5톤짐, 5톤짐, 6톤짐
   - 7.5톤짐, 10톤짐, 12.5톤짐, 15톤짐
   - 17.5톤짐, 20톤짐

3. WORK FLOOR: 2-25 (floor number)

4. LOADING/UNLOADING SERVICE:
   - NONE: No loading/unloading help
   - LOADING: Loading service only
   - UNLOADING: Unloading service only
   - BOTH: Both loading and unloading

5. TRAVEL DISTANCE:
   - WITHIN_JURISDICTION: Local area
   - OUTSIDE_JURISDICTION: Outside local area

6. DUMP SERVICE: true/false

7. MOVING FEE: Base fee in KRW (e.g., 3000)

PRICING CALCULATION:
- Base price from ladder truck price table
- Based on work floor + luggage volume
- Moving fee added separately
- Platform fee model: Total Work Fee (10%) + Moving Fee
*/

item.name: Create Global Ladder Job Post (On Site)

body.raw:
{
  "type": "GLOBAL",
  "category": "LADDER",
  "ladderType": "ON_SITE",
  "luggageVolume": "10톤짐",
  "workFloor": 15,
  "overallHeight": 45,
  "ladderWorkDuration": "8시간",
  "ladderWorkHours": 2,
  "loadingUnloadingService": "NONE",
  "travelDistance": "OUTSIDE_JURISDICTION",
  "dumpService": true,
  "onSiteFee": 5000,
  "workDateType": "TOMORROW",
  "arrivalTime": "08:00",
  "isNightWork": false,
  "paymentMethod": "DIRECT_PAYMENT",
  "expectedPaymentDate": "Same Day",
  "withFee": true,
  "siteAddress": "456 Construction Site, Busan, South Korea",
  "contactNumber": "010-9876-5432",
  "workContents": "Demolition",
  "deliveryInfo": "Heavy equipment operation required"
}

/*
ON_SITE LADDER WORK FLOW:

1. WORK SCHEDULE STEP EXISTS:
   - ladderWorkDuration: "1시간", "4시간", "8시간", "추가1시간"
   - ladderWorkHours: Additional hours when "추가1시간" selected
   - Duration selector (days, half-days, hours)

2. WORK CONTENTS BUTTONS:
   - "Demolition": Demolition work
   - "Waste": Waste disposal work
   - "Material Lifting": Material lifting work

3. PRICING CALCULATION:
   - Base price from ladder truck price table
   - Based on work floor + work schedule
   - Price table reference: Floor + Duration
   - Example: 15th floor + 8시간 = 70 (from table)

4. PAYMENT METHOD:
   - Platform Fee Model: Total Work Fee (10%) + On-site Fee (5,000 KRW)
   - onSiteFee: 5000 KRW base fee

5. PRICE TABLE REFERENCE:
   - Site (Work Schedule): 1시간, 4시간, 8시간, 추가1시간
   - Prices vary by floor (2-25층)
   - Example: 15층 + 8시간 = 70 (70,000 KRW)

6. NIGHT WORK LOGIC:
   - If isNightWork: true, base price = 0 KRW
   - Special pricing applies for night work
*/

item.name: Create Community Ladder Job Post (Moving Goods)

body.raw:
{
  "type": "COMMUNITY",
  "category": "LADDER",
  "communityId": 1,
  "ladderType": "MOVING_GOODS",
  "luggageVolume": "5톤짐",
  "workFloor": 12,
  "overallHeight": 36,
  "loadingUnloadingService": "BOTH",
  "travelDistance": "WITHIN_JURISDICTION",
  "dumpService": false,
  "movingFee": 3000,
  "workDateType": "TODAY",
  "arrivalTime": "10:00",
  "isNightWork": false,
  "paymentMethod": "DIRECT_PAYMENT",
  "expectedPaymentDate": "당일",
  "withFee": true,
  "siteAddress": "789 Community Building, Seoul, South Korea",
  "contactNumber": "010-5555-1234",
  "workContents": "Moving furniture to 12th floor apartment",
  "deliveryInfo": "Community members only - please coordinate with group leader"
}

/*
COMMUNITY LADDER JOB POST (MOVING GOODS):

1. COMMUNITY SELECTION:
   - communityId: Selected community
   - Job posted within community only
   - Same ladder flow as Global but community-specific

2. COMMUNITY FEE MODEL:
   - Total Work Fee (%): Set by Group Leader (from community.defaultWorkFee)
   - Moving Fee: 3,000 KRW (set by Group Leader)
   - Support Fee: Set by Group Leader for "On-site" work
   - Fee Flow: Receiver → Orderer (Not via Platform)

3. PAYMENT METHOD OPTIONS:
   - 결제 방식: 싸인(SIGNATURE), 직수(DIRECT_PAYMENT), 현수(CASH)
   - 예상 결제일: 당일, 이틀, 7일, 월말, 익월초, 익월말, 직접확인

4. FEE APPLICATION:
   - 수수료 있음/없음 선택 가능
   - 기본값: 수수료 있음
   - 수수료 없음 선택 시:
     * 작업총액수수료: 지급되지 않음
     * 현장수수료: 지급되지 않음
     * 모임방 지원 수수료: 지급여부 방장이 설정

5. COMMUNITY-SPECIFIC FEATURES:
   - Community points system
   - Designated drivers within community
   - Group leader coordination
*/

item.name: Create Community Ladder Job Post (On Site)

body.raw:
{
  "type": "COMMUNITY",
  "category": "LADDER",
  "communityId": 1,
  "ladderType": "ON_SITE",
  "luggageVolume": "15톤짐",
  "workFloor": 18,
  "overallHeight": 54,
  "ladderWorkDuration": "8시간",
  "ladderWorkHours": 1,
  "loadingUnloadingService": "NONE",
  "travelDistance": "OUTSIDE_JURISDICTION",
  "dumpService": true,
  "onSiteFee": 5000,
  "workDateType": "TOMORROW",
  "arrivalTime": "07:00",
  "isNightWork": false,
  "paymentMethod": "SIGNATURE",
  "expectedPaymentDate": "이틀",
  "withFee": true,
  "siteAddress": "456 Community Construction Site, Busan, South Korea",
  "contactNumber": "010-7777-8888",
  "workContents": "Demolition",
  "deliveryInfo": "Community construction project - specialized equipment required"
}

/*
COMMUNITY LADDER JOB POST (ON SITE):

1. COMMUNITY SELECTION:
   - communityId: Selected community
   - Job posted within community only
   - Same ON_SITE flow as Global but community-specific

2. COMMUNITY FEE MODEL:
   - Total Work Fee (%): Set by Group Leader (from community.defaultWorkFee)
   - On-site Fee: Set by Group Leader (from community.defaultSupportFee)
   - Support Fee: Set by Group Leader for "On-site" work
   - Fee Flow: Receiver → Orderer (Not via Platform)

3. ON_SITE WORK SCHEDULE:
   - ladderWorkDuration: "1시간", "4시간", "8시간", "추가1시간"
   - ladderWorkHours: Additional hours when "추가1시간" selected
   - Duration selector (days, half-days, hours)

4. WORK CONTENTS OPTIONS:
   - "Demolition": Demolition work
   - "Waste": Waste disposal work
   - "Material Lifting": Material lifting work

5. PAYMENT METHOD OPTIONS:
   - 결제 방식: 싸인(SIGNATURE), 직수(DIRECT_PAYMENT), 현수(CASH)
   - 예상 결제일: 당일, 이틀, 7일, 월말, 익월초, 익월말, 직접확인

6. COMMUNITY-SPECIFIC FEATURES:
   - Community points system
   - Designated drivers within community
   - Group leader coordination
   - Community construction projects
*/

item.name: Create Designated Ladder Job Post (Moving Goods)

body.raw:
{
  "type": "DESIGNATED",
  "category": "LADDER",
  "designatedUserId": 2,
  "ladderType": "MOVING_GOODS",
  "luggageVolume": "3.5톤짐",
  "workFloor": 8,
  "overallHeight": 24,
  "loadingUnloadingService": "LOADING",
  "travelDistance": "WITHIN_JURISDICTION",
  "dumpService": false,
  "movingFee": 2500,
  "workDateType": "TODAY",
  "arrivalTime": "14:00",
  "isNightWork": false,
  "paymentMethod": "DIRECT_PAYMENT",
  "expectedPaymentDate": "Same Day",
  "withFee": true,
  "siteAddress": "789 Residential Building, Seoul, South Korea",
  "contactNumber": "010-3333-4444",
  "workContents": "Moving furniture to 8th floor apartment",
  "deliveryInfo": "Please coordinate with designated driver"
}

/*
DESIGNATED LADDER JOB POST:

1. DESIGNATED USER:
   - designatedUserId: ID of specific user to receive the job
   - Job is sent directly to this user only
   - Same ladder flow as Global but targeted to specific user

2. SAME LADDER OPTIONS AS GLOBAL:
   - All luggage volume options (1톤짐 to 20톤짐)
   - All work floor options (2-25)
   - All loading/unloading services
   - All travel distance options
   - Dump service option

3. PRICING:
   - Same pricing calculation as Global
   - Platform fee model applies
   - Moving fee included

4. WORKFLOW:
   - User selects Designated Job Post
   - User selects specific driver/user
   - User selects Ladder category
   - User selects Moving Goods or On Site
   - Same form steps as Global ladder flow
*/

item.name: Create Designated Ladder Job Post (On Site)

body.raw:
{
  "type": "DESIGNATED",
  "category": "LADDER",
  "designatedUserId": 3,
  "ladderType": "ON_SITE",
  "luggageVolume": "15톤짐",
  "workFloor": 20,
  "overallHeight": 60,
  "ladderWorkDuration": "4시간",
  "ladderWorkHours": 1,
  "loadingUnloadingService": "NONE",
  "travelDistance": "OUTSIDE_JURISDICTION",
  "dumpService": true,
  "onSiteFee": 8000,
  "workDateType": "TOMORROW",
  "arrivalTime": "07:00",
  "isNightWork": false,
  "paymentMethod": "DIRECT_PAYMENT",
  "expectedPaymentDate": "Same Day",
  "withFee": true,
  "siteAddress": "321 High-rise Building, Busan, South Korea",
  "contactNumber": "010-7777-8888",
  "workContents": "Material Lifting",
  "deliveryInfo": "Specialized equipment required - coordinate with designated operator"
}

/*
DESIGNATED ON_SITE LADDER WORK:

1. DESIGNATED USER:
   - designatedUserId: Specific operator/worker selected
   - Job sent directly to this user
   - Same ON_SITE flow as Global

2. ON_SITE WORK SCHEDULE:
   - ladderWorkDuration: "1시간", "4시간", "8시간", "추가1시간"
   - ladderWorkHours: Additional hours when "추가1시간" selected

3. WORK CONTENTS OPTIONS:
   - "Demolition": Demolition work
   - "Waste": Waste disposal work
   - "Material Lifting": Material lifting work (selected)

4. HIGH-RISE WORK:
   - workFloor: 20 (high-rise building)
   - overallHeight: 60m
   - Requires specialized equipment

5. PRICING:
   - Higher on-site fee for high-rise work (8,000 KRW)
   - Same platform fee model: Total Work Fee (10%) + On-site Fee
   - Time-based pricing for ON_SITE work

6. PRICE TABLE REFERENCE:
   - 20층 + 4시간 = 60 (60,000 KRW base price)
   - Plus on-site fee: 8,000 KRW
   - Plus platform fees
*/
